name: todoapp
description: todo app in .net con utilizzo di reactjs

scripts.watch-js: watchify Scripts/index.jsx --extension=.jsx -o static/bundle.js -v -t [ babelify --presets [ env react stage-3 ] ]
scripts.develop: browserify Scripts/index.jsx -o static/bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ env react stage-3 ] ]
scripts.min: browserify static/bundle.js -g [ babelify --presets [ env react stage-3 ] ] -g [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] -g uglifyify | uglifyjs --compress --mangle > static/bundle.min.js

author: Enrico Guerra
